page.title: 07FLAX BOURTON VILLAGE
page.content: In Flax Bourton most of the buildings are on the north side of the A370. There is a fairly small Church with a small Post Office next to it.There is one very small school which consists of 78 children. Parsons Mead is the biggest modern development in Flax Bourton. The most unusal group of houses in Flax Bourton is probably the Shapes ,which is a group of modern houses. There have been quite a few new groups of houses built this year including The Grange which is on the south side of the A370.Castle Close is a group of 8 houses built in 1980. In Flax Bourton there is one Inn called the Jubilee.
